item.description:
Networking Extravaganza/View the FDI Opportunity TUESDAY, MARCH 10, 2009, RSVP with Bernadette at 603-834-4587 and MEET the $$13 MILLION DOLLAR MAN$$ Steve Schulz and FDI's new VP of Marketing Jim Ginnochio!

Tuesday 3/10/09 - 6:30 PM Networking, 7:30 PM Presentation

Where: 1 Industrial Dr, Windham, NH

Directions to 1 Industrial Dr, Windham (streets have been re-routed, please print these directions, GPS doesn't work):
From Rt 93
Take exit 3, RT-111 E ramp toward NO. SALEM.
Turn onto INDIAN ROCK RD/NH-111.
Turn LEFT onto RANGE RD/NH-111. (at traffic lights at the "T")
Take L at next set of lights which is Lamson St.
Turn RIGHT to on INDUSTRIAL DR.
Last building on the right is the new corporate office.


Desire...Commit...Succeed!


Bernadette Trafton
Marketing Director
Home Office: 603-764-5788
Cell Phone: 603-834-4587
www.BostonAREIA.com
Bernadette@BostonAREIA.com

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Networking Extravaganza - Meet The 13 Million Dollar Man, Steve Schulz
